title: Clipper Wars
description: It's the XIX century! [Clippers](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clipper) are revolutionizing sea transport and rich gentlemen are drowning themselves in tea! A *situation* has caused an shortage of tea in Boston and it's up to **you** to deal with it!
goalDescription: Add `(stock boston tea)` to the fact table.
winMessage: Hey, did that ship have opium on it? It sailed by so fast I didn't see.
